Service Details: - Offers a sailing program for sailors of all ages and abilities - Programs are taught by Sail Canada certified sailing and windsurfing coaches and include the use of the society's PFD's - Able Sail program runs from the end of May until mid-September- Lessons can take place as part of our regular Learn to Sail program (Puddle Jumpers, Wind Riders, CAN Sail, Adult, or Family lessons), or on an individual sail basis, with each sail lasting 1.5 hours
Address & Map: 4220 Hobson RdKelowna, BC     V1W 1Y3View MapQuest Map
